datum.name: Absent Minded Genius
datum.field: You recive 16 to all your INT checks and int-related skill checks. You recieve -214 to all your WIS checks and WIL related skill checks.

datum.name: Absorb Skill
datum.field: Character can steal a total of Lvl skill levels from other people. When a skill level is overwritten by another one, then the target the first skill was stolen from gets it back. This skill may not be kept for more than lvl hours.

datum.name: Absorb Surface Structure
datum.field: Character can absorb the surface attributes of a non-living substance. For example, if the character wants to absorb a stone surface, his skin gains the hardness of stone, and the limb is unmovable, until the surface is released.

datum.name: Adhesion
datum.field: Character can stick to surfaces, allowing him to runclimb up wall and ceilings as if he was walking normally.

datum.name: Agent of Fate
datum.field: You critical fail on all rolls of 1, 2, or 3. You automatically succeed on rolls of 18, 19, and 20.

datum.name: Alternate Body Substance
datum.field: Character takes no damage from physical damage. Crushing attacks tend to splatter the character. Severed limbs in this form are regrown if there is a source of water. Fire damage deals x3 damage. Ice will freeze the character, but no damage.

datum.name: Arcane Talent
datum.field: This is a stand in. A character may take a magical spell of any rank as a Trait. They do not need to buy Magical Control, Spellcasting, Faith, Mysticism, etc. The rank of the specific Trait is the rank of the spell. For purposes of control (striking, LVL, etc.), the level at which the Spell Ability has been purchased is used for these calculations. The cost of using the ability is the same Mana Point cost as the spell itself.Ignaceous Charcot FlammeIgnaceousalter-identity is the mutant superhero, Flame-On!The exclamation point is part of the name.. He has the following Arcane Talents: Fireblast at Level 4, Fire Shards at level 4, Flame Shroud at level 1, Living Fire at level 1, and Flame Whip at level 2. Although he feels it was unnecessary, his secret master has been forcing him to train in the mystic arts to learn to control his powers better (Mysticism, level 3). Although he thinks it's bunk, and wasn't necessary, he can certainly use his powers longer nowadays.We note that for Flame Whip, Fire Shards, and Fireblast the description in says to roll to determine if Ignaceous strikes. Ignaceous would roll his level he has purchased the skills at, i.e. levels 2, 4, and 4, respectively.

datum.name: Attention to Detail
datum.field: You recive plus 1 on ALL non-combat skill rolls, except when hurried.

datum.name: Awe
datum.field: Upon activation, all those that see the character must make a willpower roll at -Lvl*2. If unsuccessful, than those affected are VERY likely to agree with the character, and even less likely to attack him. Lasts for CHA minutes.

datum.name: Blink
datum.field: (Teleportation Dodge) - Character can Blink out of the way of an attack. Roll to dodge at LVL D + (DEX or WIL)

datum.name: Bookworm
datum.field: You recive +2 on academic skill rolls. You recive a +1 when those rolls are rushed or hurried. If you have Mental Training then you receive the +2, hurried or not.

datum.name: Bouncing
datum.field: No falling damage, crash damage, etc. Character will bounce like a rubber ball.

datum.name: Brute
datum.field: You recive a constant bonus of 2 STR and 2 BLD. You loose one action in combat, permanently. Your speed is reduced by 1 and you are at -1 to all INT and WIS skill rolls.
Strength += 2*Level; Build += 2*Level; Speed -= 1*Level; Intelligence -= 1*Level; Wisdom -= 1*Level; Height *= pow(1.1,Level); Weight *= pow(1.25,Level);

datum.name: Burrowing
datum.field: Character can dig a tunnel through almost any substance (even granite and other hard stones) at a rate of Lvl mph

datum.name: Chameleon
datum.field: Equivalent to a camo skill of lvl, takes 1 action to transform into a new pattern.

datum.name: Communicate with Animals
datum.field: Character may communicate with lvl animals at a time

datum.name: Communicate with Demons
datum.field: Character may communicate with lvl demons at a time

datum.name: Communicate with Machines
datum.field: Character can talk to any machine that is within 20*Lvl feet away. It can be persuaded to do things for the character.

datum.name: Communicate with Spirits
datum.field: Character may communicate with lvl spirits at a time

datum.name: Control
datum.field: Character can control up to a total ofLVL-22* 30 cp worth of spirits. The spirit must obey any commands until death.

datum.name: Deafen
datum.field: Character can make lvl targets at a time deaf for 1 turn.

datum.name: Dimensional Travel
datum.field: Character can shift between Lvl other dimensions.

datum.name: Disruption (Nervous System)
datum.field: Target looses Lvl-2 actions and -2*Lvl to all actions for Lvl d 4-1 turns. Considered an electric attack. Touch.

datum.name: Doesn't breathe
datum.field: Character does not need to breathe.

datum.name: Double Jointed
datum.field: You recive +1 DEX for purposes of contortion, escaping from bonds, and maneuvering in tight places. Opponents trying to put you into a weapon lock or martial arts hold have an extra -2 to succeed.

datum.name: Drain HP
datum.field: Character can steal Lvl HP from target, and gain Lvl HP. Requires touch.

datum.name: Drain MP
datum.field: Character can stealLvl2* 5 MP from target, and gainLvl2* 5 MP. Requires touch.

datum.name: Durable
datum.field: Character gets no additional negatives (or fall unconscious) by dropping below 0 or more HP for Lvl turns.

datum.name: Egghead
datum.field: Once per day you may take +2 INT for one skill roll or attribute check. However, you are then at -2 CHR for the rest of the day.

datum.name: Eidetic Memory
datum.field: +1 on all academic skill rolls. +1 on all WIS checks. +1 LVL to trivia skill. Once per day you may add + 14 to one academic skill roll.

datum.name: Emit Odor
datum.field: Character emits an odor up to 10*lvl2feet away. Purchase for each odor.

datum.name: Energy Absorption
datum.field: Character can absorb up to 5*Lvl points of damage in energy per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.

datum.name: Enhanced Moral
datum.field: For each level, your 'whole side' gains 2 initiative.

datum.name: Faith
datum.field: For each level, your 'whole side' gains 2 initiative.

datum.name: Fireworks
datum.field: Character can create fireworks type flashes within 20 * lvl feet. Anyone within 10*lvl feet from activation area gets - 1 actions for Lvl d 4-1 turns. And is at a -lvl to all actions for that duration.

datum.name: Flight
datum.field: Character can fly with a speed of 10*Lvl mph (or 15*Lvl if carrying very little). Wings are a good minor flaw.

datum.name: Float
datum.field: Character can float a few inches above the ground or smooth water. Can move atLvl2mph.

datum.name: Forcefield
datum.field: Erect a FF with a radius of up to Lvl * 5 ft around character. Can takeLvl2* 25 damage. Opponents are +1 to strike the forcefield. FF regenerates Lvl HP per hour.

datum.name: Generation
datum.field: 4*Lvl gallons of water flow out of the character per second. Requires a STR check at -Lvl or be washed away.

datum.name: Globe of Darkness
datum.field: Character can create a ball of darkness with radius of 15 x Lvl feet

datum.name: Globe of Light
datum.field: Character can create a ball of light with radius of 15 x Lvl feet

datum.name: Grace
datum.field: Character is inhumanly gracefull. His motions are never jerky, always smooth transitions from one position to the next.

datum.name: Hard Body
datum.field: You gain +1 CHR and +1 BLD. However, this bonus only applies if you have followed a particular diet andor training regimen that day.

datum.name: Hardened Worker
datum.field: You recive natural armor of XX+1X where X is equal to half your level in that skill.

datum.name: Healing (Others)
datum.field: Character can heal others with a touch. The target gains Lvl HP per turn.

datum.name: Heroic Armor
datum.field: You may choose to wear skimpy clothing instead of standard armor. You recive armor equal XXX where X = (CHA-8 +LVL of Beauty + LVL of Fashion Skill). This has no encumberance. You cannot use ability while wearing armor of any kind.

datum.name: Hold Breath
datum.field: or whatever the character normally needs to breeth for lvl hours at a time

datum.name: Hot Stuff
datum.field: You recive +1 CHR with respect to dealings of the opposite sex. You recive -1 CHR for dealings with the same sex.

datum.name: Immortality
datum.field: Character will not age while the power is activated.

datum.name: Immune to Disease and Poisons
datum.field: Character is completely immune to all diseases (this includes poison type spells as well).

datum.name: Immune to Falling
datum.field: Character takes no damage from falling.

datum.name: Intangibility
datum.field: Character takes no physical damage and may walk through substances. Note that this does NOT grant the character the ability to fly or hover. He must still walk, though he may dive into a substance.

datum.name: Invisibility
datum.field: Character is completely invisible to visible light. A good minor flaw would be that the character still has a shadow.

datum.name: Ironman
datum.field: You recive +3 to all BLD checks involving acts of endurance

datum.name: Kinetic Absorption
datum.field: Character can absorb up to 5 * Lvl points of damage from kinetic damage (PSC) per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.

datum.name: Kinetic Acceleration
datum.field: Can throw just about anything with amazing force. Thrown objects deal an additional Lvl D 4 P, S, or damage.

datum.name: Light Emit
datum.field: Character emits enough light to illuminate (like day) an area up to 5*Lvl2in radius.

datum.name: Light Meld
datum.field: Character is completely undetectable when within a bright light that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.

datum.name: Lucky SOB
datum.field: You earn luck at double the normal rate. However, your max luck is always no more than 2 points.

datum.name: Magic Immunity
datum.field: Character is completely immune to all magic attacks and effects (good an bad) with 1 success on Lvl D + 10 (roll for good AND bad spells and effects). This does include magic that is thrown at him.

datum.name: Magical Affinity
datum.field: You have a natrual ability to sense the presence of magical abilities and objects. You recive the ability to detect magic as if you had Magical Studies LVL2. If you already have that skill, gain +1 LVL to all your rolls.

datum.name: Magnetism
datum.field: Character can manipulate up toLvl3* 10 pounds of metal. Metal pieces may be thrown for an attack (one action) that deals Lvl D 6 SPC damage.

datum.name: Melt
datum.field: Character can melt into a puddle that can flow through cracks, etc. He still weighs the same, and takes up the same volume. He is COMPLETELY defenseless, and can only move at 1 foot per second. 0 Base Armor and immune to physical attacks.

datum.name: Mimic
datum.field: Copy the supernatural abilities from other characters as long as the total cost of the abilities has no more than Lvl * 20 character points.

datum.name: Move Through Substance
datum.field: Character can move through the substance at a rate of a slow walk. Name the substance at purchase time. Character can take anything he is wearing with him, nothing else.

datum.name: Mute
datum.field: Character can make 1 target at a time mute for Lvl turns.

datum.name: Natural Armor
datum.field: Character has some form of natural (or mystical) covering that gives himLvl2PSC protection and Lvl U protection.

datum.name: Nice Guy
datum.field: +1 on all CHR based skill checks and attribute checks. You are -3 to all rolls involving seduction.

datum.name: Nightvision
datum.field: Character can see in absolute darkness for up to Lvl*20 feet

datum.name: Nose for Truth
datum.field: You recive +3 to CHR-related skill or attribute checks that involve diplomacy and negotiation. You also recive +2 to skill checks related to investigation or detecting lies.

datum.name: Pain Block
datum.field: Character feels NO pain. He is not adversely affected by hit-point loss (though he still looses HP, and will die when -HP is reached).

datum.name: Pierce Invulnerability
datum.field: Character can deal damage to invulnerable creatures.

datum.name: Plant Control
datum.field: Character can control up toLvl2* 10 pounds of plant material. Can be used to attack others (takes one action) with the plants, deals Lvl D 6 damage.

datum.name: Possession
datum.field: Character can take control of another creature if it has fewer character points than he does. His original body appears to be sucked into the new body. If the new body is killed, the character pops back out.

datum.name: Protective Field
datum.field: Name substance the field is made of. The character is surrounded by a swirling field of substance. Any attacks of this substance that passes through field is reduced to 0 damage. All other damage is reduced by a quarter.

datum.name: Reality Pocket
datum.field: Sends the character to a little pocket of reality. He can leave when he wishes, time does not pass outside of pocket. Character still ages within the Reality Pocket.

datum.name: Regeneration
datum.field: Character can regrow any limb at a rate of Lvl pounds per day.

datum.name: Rot Substance
datum.field: Character can accelerate the deteriation of organic matter (by a LOT). Character must touch the object. Can rot Lvl pounds of organic matter per second.

datum.name: See Invisible
datum.field: Character may see anything that is invisible

datum.name: Self Resurrection
datum.field: Character can bring himself back to life Lvl number of times. He revives with full abilities, HP, etc.

datum.name: Sense HP
datum.field: Character can detect how many HP the target has.

datum.name: Sense MP
datum.field: Character can detect how many MP the target has.

datum.name: Shadow Meld
datum.field: Character is completely undetectable when within a deep shadow that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.

datum.name: Shapeshift
datum.field: Character can change the form of his body. This includes fairly basic transformation, growing hair, changing skin color, shift body mass, etc.

datum.name: Shifting Attributes
datum.field: Character can shift 4*Lvl attribute points around at a time.

datum.name: Size
datum.field: Character gains Lvl sizes, gains2LvlStrength, looses Lvl Dex, multiply HP and Base Armor by2Lvl.

datum.name: Slow Motion
datum.field: Character sees the world in slow motion. Character gets lvl additional attempts to parry an attack.

datum.name: Smooth Operator
datum.field: You recive +2 to deception, forgery, and social engineering type skill rolls. You recive +1 CHR for purposes of seduction and deception.

datum.name: Sonic Control
datum.field: Character can emit and hear VERY high and low pitched sounds (think bats here) as well as very quite or loud sounds. Can be used as an attack that deals Lvl D 4 U damage.

datum.name: Spirit Control
datum.field: Take control of LVL spirits whose character points are fewer than your own.

datum.name: Split Body
datum.field: Character can create Lvl clones of himself. Can regenerate a dead clone in a month.

datum.name: Statuation
datum.field: Ability to turn into a non-moving statue (name the substance at purchase) at will. Character is COMPLETELY undetectable by ANY means to be anyting but a statue. Statue image and size are what the character looked like upon entering the state.

datum.name: Steal Supernatural Ability
datum.field: Character steals one ability from the target (requires touch) if that ability cost less than Lvl * 20 cp. If another ability is stolen, the owner of the previous ability gets it back.

datum.name: Stretchability
datum.field: Character can stretch up to Lvl times as long, or 1Lvl times as thin as he currently is. This gives the character an additional 00Lvl*2 personal armor

datum.name: Substance Surfing
datum.field: Character can create a trail of substance that is used to surf on. The trail must be anchored to something, but can be as long as needed. Speed is 10*Lvl MPH. It takes 40*Lvl damage before it will be destroyed. Name substance when purchased.

datum.name: Supernatural Attribute
datum.field: Purchase per attribute that is at least a 20. Increase the max attribute to 20 +lvl2, and purchase additional points as if the base attribute is 12 the current attribute.

datum.name: Sure Footed
datum.field: You recive +2 to all Dex checks involving balance, jumping, or remaining standing.

datum.name: Teleportation
datum.field: Character can teleport up toLvl2* 5 miles away that he can see or has been.

datum.name: The Champ
datum.field: You do not fall unconcious when you drop below 0 HP

datum.name: Transfer HP
datum.field: Character can transfer Lvl HP to a target per second. Requires Touch

datum.name: Transfer MP
datum.field: Character can transferLvl2* 5 MP to a target per second. Requires Touch

datum.name: Unbreakable Grip
datum.field: Character can initiate a grip that requires a strength of STR+Lvl2. Adds Level to any grappling skill.

datum.name: Walk on Air
datum.field: Character can walk on air. He can walk up air steps, go over air bridges, even create air walls (for himself only).

datum.name: Weapon Master
datum.field: Acts as an 8th level skill in ONE weapon, no other weapon skills may be bought by the character

datum.name: Weather Control
datum.field: Character can control the weather (basic stuff here, no tornadoes, huricanes, etc) for an area ofLvl2square miles.

datum.name: Whirlwind
datum.field: When whirlwind is active, the character appears to be an opaque tornado (think Tasmanian Devil here). All projectiles will be deflected. Anything that comes in contact with the character will receive 36+2C damage.

datum.name: Withstand Pressure
datum.field: Character can withstand high and low pressure environments. This includes a vacuum and underwater.

datum.name: X-Ray Vision
datum.field: Character can see through any substance that is no more thanLvl2feet thick.

datum.name: Active Stealth
datum.field: 75chance of resisting detection by Radar or Sonar. Uses 3* SIZE PC

datum.name: Advanced Cloaking System
datum.field: +5 Camo skill. Mech is invisible to light-based detection when not moving

datum.name: Advanced ECM
datum.field: 100chance of working, High manuever missiles have no bonus, can misrepresent radar signiture. 15 PC

datum.name: Advanced communications
datum.field: Communication system that is resistant to jamming and detection

datum.name: Ammo pod
datum.field: Can holdX2slots worth of armor where X is no larger than the size of suit. The pod has2X2armor. If the pod is pierced, the ammo is rendered useless.

datum.name: Armor Suit
datum.field: Choose a human armor, multiply values by Size-1. CP: normal amount * (size-1)

datum.name: Armored Cockpit (Mecha Only)
datum.field: Protects the pilot's compartment with 50more armor than the rest of the mecha.

datum.name: Chaff Launcher
datum.field: Has 10 uses before refill. Each gives 25to fool RADAR sensor or Missile

datum.name: Climbing System
datum.field: Range ofSize-12150feet. Minimum of 50'. Uses 5 PC per use

datum.name: Combination Ability
datum.field: Can combine with another vehicle, mecha, or power armor

datum.name: Communication Jammer
datum.field: 2000' range. 100to interrupt radio, 75to disrupt advanced comm

datum.name: Compact Transformation
datum.field: Transforms into something with size -1, no weapons or attribute bonuses are accessible

datum.name: Consumable Rocket System: Extra fast
datum.field: +1 to dodge per chargeGet 10 charges before recharging system

datum.name: Consumable Rocket System: Fast
datum.field: mimics jump jets (see that sys) Can only be used 4 times before must be recharged

datum.name: Consumable Rocket System: Slow burn
datum.field: mimics hover system for 1 min. Can only be used once before must be recharged

datum.name: Consumable Rocket System: Standard
datum.field: Travel +300 mph for 30 sec. Can only be used once before must be recharged

datum.name: Direct Controls
datum.field: Gives +1 LEVEL to mecha related skills (including piloting, dodge, weapons, ect.)

datum.name: EM Pulse Generator
datum.field: X*10 yard radius. Has 75chance to shut down electronic devices in the area

datum.name: Easy maintenace
datum.field: Anyone making an engineering or electrical roll when working on vehicle gets +2

datum.name: Easy to modify
datum.field: Modifications repairs can be done in 1/2 the normal time

datum.name: Environmental protection
datum.field: Size2hours in air supply, rebreather, stops poisons and radiation fallout

datum.name: Equipment Shielding
datum.field: Protects a certain piece of equipment from electronic effects (EM pulse, Logic Bomb). The sheilding equipment it protects are immune to electronic effects + damage but other types of weapons (bullets, bombs, missiles, lasers, etc.) will destroy BOTH

datum.name: Extra Jammer Emitter
datum.field: Add +50range to a Jammer. Uses 2 PC

datum.name: False Destruction
datum.field: Simulates the explosion of the power armor or mecha to give the appearance of death

datum.name: Fire Resistant Coating
datum.field: Armor will not catch on fire

datum.name: Flare Launcher
datum.field: Has 10 uses before refill. Each gives 25to fool thermal sensor or missile

datum.name: Flash System
datum.field: Gives +5 Dex; +1 action/turn. Pilot takes D damage from combat rather than U.

datum.name: Force Field
datum.field: Each point of damage done to the force field, 1 PC is used.

datum.name: Holographic View Cockpit
datum.field: Gives +2 to: mecha piloting, dodge, use of melee/HtH skills, and dex checks.

datum.name: Hypno-Flash System
datum.field: X*10 yard radius. Anyone seeing flash w/o anti-dazzle looses 2 actions this round

datum.name: Internal medical system
datum.field: Will stop bleeding. Once per "charge" it can give 24+1 HP ( 1000 to refill)

datum.name: Logic Blast System
datum.field: X*10 yard radius. 100chance to shut down electronics, 50to destroy them.

datum.name: Magical Transformation
datum.field: Everything must be bought for the new form. Can form into ANY other item.

datum.name: Master Cloak
datum.field: +8 Camo skills. Mech is invisible to light-based detection.

datum.name: Non-dextrous hand
datum.field: x1.5 strength and -5 dex with that hand. Used for construction and punching.

datum.name: Passive Stealth
datum.field: 50chance of resisting detection by Radar or Sonar

datum.name: Pinpoint Forcefield
datum.field: Like forcefield, 3 hp per 1 PC. Parry with a skill of 3 or get a +2 to a defensive skill

datum.name: Quantum Teleport Engine
datum.field: Uses SIZE*100 PC. Allows mech to teleport to location in 1 action.

datum.name: Rugged Movement System
datum.field: Must be bought for each movement system. 1 movement system is more rugged (GM).

datum.name: Self Destruct
datum.field: Destroys vehicle and pilot if he/she hasn't ejected, or by pilot's command

datum.name: Self Repair
datum.field: Repairs Size HP per hour (up to half of damage taken). UsesSize2power

datum.name: Shield
datum.field: See shields in the armor section for larger than normal shields

datum.name: Shielded Armor
datum.field: Doubles armor. Power: All PC production+Size2

datum.name: Spot Armor
datum.field: Protects a certain piece of equipment. If it is hit by an attack, the armor is damaged rather than the equipment.

datum.name: Spread-spectrum Detector
datum.field: 50chance of negating active stealth. Only one per vehicle. With 2 systems, 100chance of negating active stealth. Uses 7 power.

datum.name: Supercharger
datum.field: Increases speed any one movement system by 50, doubles power required.

datum.name: Thermal Masking
datum.field: Makes mecha invisible to thermal sensors, cannot be targeted by heat seekers

datum.name: Transformation ability
datum.field: Get +50speed for related form. (more wheeled speed for cars)

datum.name: Weapon Storage
datum.field: Requires slots equal to the slot size of a weapon / 5. Minimum of 1 slot

datum.name: Weapon arm
datum.field: Can hold a weapon, weapon takes up no slots. They are easier to destroy

datum.name: Weapon grouping
datum.field: Group X weapons together, can be shot in groups or singly. Use bonus of least accurate weapon

datum.name: Zero-G controls
datum.field: Removes any negatives while within altered gravity areas (space, underwater, etc)

datum.name: Auto-Cannon
datum.field: Automatically Loading Cannon An autocannon is similar to a modern semiautomatic rifle, but scaled up to an artillery size weapon. Ammunition is stored in a magazine and the gun automatically loads a new shell after each is fired.

datum.name: Chaingun
datum.field: Chainguns fire a 16 burst. They are fully automatic weapons, similar to anti-aircraft guns. They are generally belt-fed.

datum.name: Field Gun
datum.field: A Field Gun is a slow to reload, single shot, gun. A tank cannon or artillery piece would be a classic example. Field guns take one action to reload before they can fire again. Reloading is automated, so the pilot can do something else while waiting.

datum.name: Flechette Cannon
datum.field: Flechette cannon deals (Class+1)D4+(Class/3) S (Slashing) damage, in bursts of 110. They have 10 AP. Flechette ammunition is 1/10th the size of usual ammunition (thus a pod stores 10x as much ammunition), but costs 5x more.

datum.name: Grenade Launcher
datum.field: Deals (Class+1)* 46+1U + Fire damage with a radius of (Class+1)*20 feet. An ammunition pod holds 5 grenades, regardless of Class.

datum.name: Long Rail Gun
datum.field: Alternately, the Long Rail Gun can be carried like a rifle, but has to be manually reloaded with a recovery time if (Class+5) actions. Deals double normal damage, with (Class+10)*20 AP. Requires (Class+1)*10 free energy units from the engines.

datum.name: Progressive Vulcan
datum.field: The progressive vulcan is the most advanced fully automatic weapon available. They fire 46 round bursts. They work on a principle similar to a standard vulcan, except that they have multiple breeches and fire from more than one barrel at a time.

datum.name: Rail Gun
datum.field: In addition to normal damage, the Rail Gun has (Class+4)*10 AP. Requires (Class+1)*3 free units of energy to shoot per turn (from the engines).

datum.name: Shotgun
datum.field: Mecha Shotgun's deal half the usual damage of a similar weapon of the same size and ammunition, i.e. if it is a 75mm shotgun, then it deals ( 4610 )/2 = 465C (Crushing) damage. Shotguns use 525 rounds per shot, depending upon the set-up of the weapon. Shotguns get a bonus to Strike of 1+(Class+2)/2. The range is 1/4 of the usual weapon range.

datum.name: Snub Cannon
datum.field: Uses a very heavy barrel and a much more powerful detonant. Deals (Class+1)/2 (rounded up!) x20 (Crushing) damage. Has a 100' maximum range. The mecha may not fire while moving or the next action after firing. Recovery time is 3, and requires dextrous, working arms and hands.

datum.name: Vulcan
datum.field: Vulcans are automatic weapons capable of high rates of fire. They fire 26 bursts. These are multi-barrelled weapons, where the barrels are rotated mechanically.

datum.name: L-Particle Cannon
datum.field: A variant of the Particle Cannon that is tuned for a special defective(non-m-brane modulating) Higgs particle; the effective range on the cannon is unlimited. It's range is literally unlimited, but must be purchased as if it costs 5 Classes above it's normal Class.

datum.name: Laser Cannon
datum.field: A weapon tuned for Slashing and (optionally) OverFire.

datum.name: Particle Cannon
datum.field: A weapon tuned for Higgs-Particles and (optionally) OverFire.

datum.name: Plasma Blast Cannon
datum.field: A weapon tuned for Fire and Area Effect.

datum.name: Plasma Cannaon
datum.field: A weapon tuned for Flame and (optionally) OverFire.

datum.name: Pulse Laser Cannon
datum.field: A weapon tuned for Pulse and (optionally) OverFire.

datum.name: WA-Beam Cannon
datum.field: (Wide Area); an untuned long-firing weapon; uses twice the energy but can be used on up to 3 targets.

datum.name: A/V Recorder
datum.field: Has 2 hour of recording time, can take pictures or record video sound

datum.name: Advanced Audio
datum.field: Library of particular sounds, filters, active sound suppression, sound source locator

datum.name: Advanced Display
datum.field: Displays more information to the pilot such as range, ETA data, very user-friendly

datum.name: Advanced Sensor Package
datum.field: The following items make up this package: Advanced Display, A/V Recorder, Navigation Instruments, Basic RADAR, Broadband Video System, Advanced Audio, Seismic Detector, and Anti-dazzle.

datum.name: Anti-dazzle
datum.field: Intelligently filters out light and sound that would otherwise startle the pilot

datum.name: Artillery computer
datum.field: Removes all strike negatives with indirect fire weapons, and +1 LEVEL to a skill when defending against artillery or indirect attacks.

datum.name: Basic Audio Processor
datum.field: Allows pilot to listen outside the mecha and speak through a loudspeaker

datum.name: Basic Instruments
datum.field: Displays engine power, temperature, fuel levels, (like an auto dash panel)

datum.name: Basic RADAR
datum.field: Range of 5 miles, useful for locating larger objects.

datum.name: Basic Sensor Package
datum.field: The following items make up this package: External Camera, Status Monitor, Basic Instruments, Basic Audio Processor, and Lights.

datum.name: Breadth Search Computer
datum.field: Uses 5 Power. Requires LVL 4 mecha piloting. Determines what opponents COULD possibly do and how you can use that information to your benefit. Gives +2 to all your defensive rolls, and +2 to strike with bursts, sprays, and area-effect weapons.

datum.name: Broadband Video system
datum.field: Zoom capability, 3-d imaging, UV and low-light night vision system

datum.name: Defensive Movement Filter
datum.field: Filter's pilots movements to keep him/her from exposing the suit to attack. -1 Actions per turn. Mecha or power armor takes 25less damage than normal (before being applied to armor)Every turn this is active subtract 2 from your initiave

datum.name: Depth Search Computer
datum.field: Uses 5 Power. Requires LVL 4 mecha piloting. Determines most likely actions of opponent. Gives +1 level to dodge, block, and parry, and +2 to strike with any kind of melee attack

datum.name: External Camera
datum.field: Provides a view outside the cockpit of the mecha

datum.name: Heart Tracker
datum.field: Can detect heart beats up to 150 feet away (through walls, etc)

datum.name: Lights
datum.field: Various lights placed around the frame of the suit

datum.name: Long Range Radar System
datum.field: 50 mile range; uses 5 power when turned on.

datum.name: Magnetic Resonance Detection
datum.field: Can detect presence, general shape, speed, altitude, and direction of metal objects

datum.name: Motion Detector
datum.field: Detect motion around the robot/armor/suit. Reduce ambush penalty by half.

datum.name: Navigation Instruments
datum.field: 3D Compass, Elevation, artificial horizon, GPS Mapping system

datum.name: Seismic Detector
datum.field: Detects seismic activity, or shock from heavy equipment or explosions.

datum.name: Sonar System
datum.field: Radar-like scanning system; works underground or underwater. Range of 5 miles.

datum.name: Status Monitor
datum.field: Displays damage reports, ammo capacities, etc.

datum.name: Targeting Computer
datum.field: Give [Bonus] to strike. If [Bonus] >= 3 allows for targeting of High Manuever Missiles

datum.name: Thermal Imaging
datum.field: Can view the heat radiated by objects. Has limited ability to see through objects.

datum.name: Threat Analizer
datum.field: Works with your sensors. Will indicate what targets are the biggest threats to you.

datum.name: Very Advanced Sensor Package
datum.field: The above items comprise VERY ADVANCED PACKAGE; +2 to Mecha Piloting
